html.p: There aren't many sights of interest in Ismater, as you find out during your exhaustive search through the place (1 is added to your Time Track). You do find two odd-looking little shops, though: the Firewater Emporium, with a window stacked full of exotic bottles, and a very dirty and run-down little shop which has a wooden sign with flaking paint on which you can just make out the letters, 'EVIL'. If you want to enter the Firewater Emporium, click here. If you want to enter the other shop, click here. If you don't wish to enter either, will you:
